cards.title: San Cristóbal
cards.body: Walls around the magical town San Cristóbal de las Casas. The climbing is spectacular, with great variety, and all within a short drive from the city center.

cards.title: Cañón del Sumidero
cards.body: Cañón del Sumidero is a deep natural canyon located just east of the city of Tuxtla along the Río Grijalva. It offers big walls of up to 1000m in height.

cards.title: Paredes de Copoya
cards.body: Very sold limestone walls with a view of Tuxtla Gutiérrez. The walls are mostly north facing.
